title: Payment calculator
description: Spring 2026 Occupancy. The Village West offers an intimate collection of 68 residences inspired by the timeless character of the Village. Its red brick, terra cotta, and arched detailing root the building in the neighborhood’s history, while contemporary touches like curved bay windows and landscaped terraces bring a modern perspective. Homes are defined by open layouts , finely crafted finishes , and abundant natural light, with many featuring private outdoor space . Amenities span four levels, including a two-tier landscaped courtyard , rooftop terrace, wellness facilities, lounge, co-working areas, and children’s playroom. Together, they create a residential experience that feels both distinctly modern and authentically of the Village.
